name: Hurry Hearse!
description:
The year is 2025. To maximize productivity and corporate profits, funerals have been reduced to a simple trip from point A to B. One funeral home aims to deliver as many as possible while still fulfilling the wishes of the recently deceased...

You have 2 minutes to complete as many contracts as possible, so Hurry, Hearse!

WASD - drive

Space - brake

X - eject casket

R (hold) - respawn

P - Pause

Pick up casket at red beam, deliver to yellow. Green repairs car!

Not done, I'll had more objectives and props around the map if it's fun!

-G
